recipesJson.name: Appermelon Gummies Candy
recipesJson.author: SteamOn
recipesJson.description:
Jolly Ranchers Apple Watermelon Gummies were the inspiration behind this recipe. Damn tasty as a S&V.

Video Link for Notes:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5lr2Tk9X5ZY

reviews.text: probably one of the best candy recipes ive ever had
Yoooo this is some gooood stuff. Great balance of üçé and melon that oddly bends into a honeydew note. It sure is delicious. Y'all mix this up for sure.
